fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.hardware.tests

Class ComputerMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.datacenter.hardware.tests.ComputerMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, ComputerStateDataConsumerI

    public class ComputerMonitor
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
implements ComputerStateDataConsumerI
    The class ComputerMonitor is a component used in the test to act as a receiver for state data notifications coming from a computer.

    Description

    The component class simply implements the necessary methods to process the notifications without paying attention to do that in a really safe component programming way. More or less quick and dirty...

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : April 24, 2015

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
